Package com.testpaper.controller

Class QuestionController

java.lang.Object
com.testpaper.controller.QuestionController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/question") @CrossOrigin("http://localhost:3000/") public class QuestionController extends Object
The QuestionController class represents the RESTful API controller for managing questions. It handles various HTTP requests related to creating, updating, retrieving, and deleting questions. It also provides endpoints for fetching questions for a test and retrieving all questions of a test. This controller works in conjunction with the QuestionService, TestService, and TestResultService.
Since:
21-06-2023
Version:
17
Author:
TPG team

    • addQuestion

      @PostMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Question> addQuestion(@RequestBody Question question)
      Adds a new question to the system.
      Parameters:
      question - The question to add.
      Returns:
      The ResponseEntity containing the added question.

    • updateQuestion

      @PutMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Question> updateQuestion(@RequestBody Question question)
      Updates the data of an existing question in the system.
      Parameters:
      question - The question to update.
      Returns:
      The ResponseEntity containing the updated question.

    • getAllQuestions

      @GetMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Question>> getAllQuestions()
      Retrieves all questions from the system.
      Returns:
      The ResponseEntity containing the list of all questions.

    • getQuestionsOfQuiz

      @GetMapping("/test/{tId}/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getQuestionsOfQuiz(@PathVariable("tId") Long tId, @PathVariable("userId") Long userId)
      Fetches the required number of questions randomly from the database for a specific test and user.
      Parameters:
      tId - The ID of the test.
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      The ResponseEntity containing the randomly selected questions for the test and user.

    • getAllQuestionsOfQuiz

      @GetMapping("/test/all/{tId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllQuestionsOfQuiz(@PathVariable("tId") Long tId)
      Retrieves all questions of a specific test from the system.
      Parameters:
      tId - The ID of the test.
      Returns:
      The ResponseEntity containing the set of all questions for the test.
